title: BlueScope Shares Slip After Spurning Steel Dynamics, SGH Bid
description: BlueScope Steel Ltd. shares slipped after it turned down the latest takeover approach from the US’s Steel Dynamics Inc., arguing an $8.8 billion joint offer with Australian conglomerate SGH Ltd. “very significantly” undervalued its assets.
